argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | snex.1 | |- A e. _V |
| 2 |  | #P_snexg | |- ( A e. _V -> { A } e. _V ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- { A } e. _V |
\
 A singleton whose element exists is a set.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2019.)
